definitions.definition: of a minimum amount, quantity, or degree; negligible.
synonyms: you can have a beautiful terrarium"

definitions.definition: characterized by the use of simple or primary forms or structures, especially geometric or massive ones.
characterized by simplicity and lack of adornment or decoration.
examples: minimal, simple evening dresses in luxurious fabrics

definitions.definition: characterized by the repetition and gradual alteration of short phrases.
(of a pair of forms) distinguished by only one feature.
examples: “p” and “b” are a minimal pair, distinguished by the feature of voicing
